text: She showcased her incredible Wicked Witch Of The Wild West ensemble earlier in the day. So it was no surprise that Jennifer Garner's three children were also in on the dress up fun. And the 46 - year - old proved she was one cool mom, picking up the kids while still in her costume with an added animal like creature on her shoulder. She's not a regular mom! Jennifer Garner proved she's a cool mom when she picked up her kids in her Wicked Witch Halloween costume on Wednesday evening Jennifer teamed her green painted face with a black T - shirt and pair of form - fitting jeans. Holding her six - year - old son Samuel's hand, she remained very much in character. The youngest Affleck sibling appeared to be dressed as a dinosaur with a slightly scary head piece.
